import { useSelector } from "react-redux" import { useState } from "react" import styles from './PostGame.module.css' function PostGame(){ const [form, setForm ]= useState({ name: '', description: '', released: '', metacritic: '', image_one:'', platforms:'', stores: '', developer: '', genres: '', tags:'' }) const [error, setError] = useState({ name: '', description: '', released: '', metacritic: '', image_one:'', platforms:'', stores: '', developer: '', genres: '', tags:'' }) function handleChange(event){ const property = event.target.name; const value = event.target.value setForm({...form, [property]: value}) if(event.target.name === 'email'){ validateLoginUsername({...form, [property]: value}, error, setError)} else{ validateLoginPassword({...form, [property]: value}, error, setError) } } return(
) } export default PostGame
